page.title: 03MUIRDRUM VILLAGE, CARNOUSTIE
page.content: {Muirdrum}is a tiny village which straddles the main A92 trunk road.The The village has a small shop, a garage, a blacksmith's and a motor and agricultural engineers and contractors. There is a major{cross-roads}in the village which has been the scene of {many serious accidents}over the years. One of the chief contributors to these accidents is the speed at which many vehicles travel through the village, despite the 30mph. speed limit. There are several children living in the village and their parents feel that their lives are at risk. In fact the residents feel so strongly that something should be done to make their village a safer place that they have raised the matter on more than one occasion with their MP.
